ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, To introduce myself let me say I, too and one of the over 40 women who play EQ.  My husband and son  were beta testers and I gave them a hard time about
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

To introduce myself let me say I, too and one of the over 40 women who
play EQ. My husband and son were beta testers and I gave them a hard
time about how much they liked to play the game until I tried it
myself. I now have three main characters I play on the Rathe server, a
druid (my favorite), a ranger, and a paladin. I also have a couple of
minor ones the I am trying out. My husband and son play also and we are
very lucky to have a couple of good computers so we can play together.
People get a kick out of finding that our characters are really mother
and son though its not as unusual when my husband and I play together.

We are trying to get together enough folks to start our own guild and
are just about there. I think that will make it even more fun.

Good hunting,
Jackie

EQ_women-owner@onelist.com wrote:

> Hi there, and welcome to EQ Women! This mailing list is
>
> for women who play the game Everquest to meet eachother
>
> and chat.
>
> You can post to the list by replying to this message,
>
> or by emailing "EQ_women@onelist.com".
>
> Please feel free to post an intro message with your
>
> character's name, race, class, level and server
>
> (and anything else you'd like).
>
> For example:
>
> "Hi everyone! I play Iuna, a 17th level wood elf druid
>
> on Mithaniel Marr. I'm looking forward to
>
> chatting on the list."
>
> If you ever want to unsubscribe, go to the ONElist web site, at
>
> www.onelist.com, and select the User Center link from the menu bar
>
> on the left. This menu will also let you change your subscription
>
> between digest and normal mode. This list is for
>
> women only, so please respect this policy and unsubscribe if you
>
> are not a woman!.
>
> Have fun,
>
> Christina
